articles.title: Pakistan arrests Imran Khan's party leaders as army deployed to quell unrest - Reuters
articles.description: Pakistani authorities took senior leaders of former Prime Minister Imran Khan's party into custody as the government called out the army to help end widespread and …
articles.content: ISLAMABAD, May 11 (Reuters) - Pakistani authorities took senior leaders of former Prime Minister Imran Khan's party into custody as the government called out the army to help end widespread and deadl… [+3289 chars]
